titles.title: A bill for the relief of John W. Ruth, Senior.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay an unspecified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of his claims against the United States arising out of losses incurred when he relied upon assurances by Federal officials during his participation in Federal efforts to develop the Appalachian region.
